posts.post_title: WTB: T200 Fatima Cards also T222 Frank Chance
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I have finally started my long delayed T200 project and I am looking for lower grade T200 team cards.  If anyone has some for sale please message me through the board or at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]   Also I am looking for a T222 Fatima Frank Chance also.  

Thanks

William
